sn48.63:4.1: “Mendicants, when these five faculties are developed and cultivated they lead to the complete understanding of the course of time.
sn48.63:4.3: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, samādhi, and wisdom.
sn48.63:4.5: When these five faculties are developed and cultivated they lead to the complete understanding of the course of time.”
